ygData.subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tantrum transforms and flies away from the giants, firing once from his catalyst blaster while he leaves. He looks for a target, and sees his Decepticon

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Tantrum transforms and flies away from the giants, firing once from his
catalyst blaster while he leaves. He looks for a target, and sees his
Decepticon brothers scattered around, and notices Firblade, in poor shape.
"Might as well help him out" he says between snorts. He flies towards him
and tranforms into bull mode. "Need some energy?" He asks, loosening one of
his tanks, so Fireblade can drink from it.
